description:
Made from a lightweight 6 oz denim fabric, this shirt is crafted from 100 % organic cotton, ensuring a comfortable and eco-friendly choice. The fabric's softness and breathability make it ideal for outdoor adventures and casual wear.

Experience the harmony between style and nature with our Jumping Deer Denim Shirt. Join us in celebrating the majestic Anticosti deer and make a statement of style and conservation.
name: Hooke Jumping Deer Denim Shirt - Mens

specs.value: 6 oz denim made of 100% organic cotton
